item.title: Compiling on windows 7
item.dc:creator: @power_of_the_blood power of the blood
item.description:
@power_of_the_blood wrote:

I downloaded combattscape source but the compiler it came with wasnt working with windows 7…it kept saying “system path not specified. so i got another compiler and its the one im currently using. when i compile it says"you have successfully compiled” but it realy hasnt. the source isnt updating…heres my current compile code:

@echo off
color 0a
title Unlimited-pkz Compiler
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
:end
echo You have sucsessfully compiled
pause
exit

help?>\

Read full topic
